question: Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo has been re-elected as the President of which country?
explanation:
Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo who is the present President of Ghana has been re- elected as the President of the country for the second time.
He has secured 51.2 percent of the vote as against his rival â€“ the former President John Mahama, who secured 48% votes.
